reviews.review_msg: This course is not an easy-credit course. I studied almost everyday for 20 mins. and I got an A. Lesson tests are not hard  but you have to pass the final exam, which is hard but fair. If you like to interact with other students, you rather take this course on campus.  Isabel is very helpful and responds to all your questions. She is very accesible
It was a busy course. Many small assignments to do. Tests were fair. Isabel always answered all questions and gave me prompt and useful feedbacks. If you study everyday, it  is a good online course.
